alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 4:36PM CDT until June 23 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Henderson County in central Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 436 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Athens, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Chandler, Brownsboro, Berryville, Edom, Lake Palestine, Coon Creek Lake, Murchison, Poynor, Coffee City, Moore Station, New York, LaRue and Walton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
